mapper.insert: INSERT INTO moment_comment (moment_id, user_id, content, create_time) VALUES (#{momentId}, #{userId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, moment_id AS momentId, user_id AS userId, content, create_time AS createTime FROM moment_comment WHERE moment_id = #{momentId} ORDER BY create_time ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM moment_comment WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
